item.title: 中国新鹏将新款经济型电动车定价为 16,813 美元，以迎头赶上
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏周二将其经济型子品牌MONA的首款车型定价为16,813美元，跻身全球最大汽车市场中需求放缓但竞争激烈的主流细分市场。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng on Tuesday priced the first model under its budget sub-brand MONA at $16,813, wedging into the mainstream, yet hyper-competitive segment of the world's largest auto market where demand slows.】

item.title: 兴登堡研究公司披露服务器制造商超微的空头头寸
item.description: 做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）周二表示，它持有服务器制造商超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）的空头头寸，理由是有证据表明该公司存在 "会计操纵"。【原文：Short seller Hindenburg Research said on Tuesday it had a short position in server maker Super Micro Computer , citing evidence of "accounting manipulation".】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司分拆欧洲业务，计划在美国上市
item.description: 世界最大的猪肉加工商史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）周二宣布分拆其欧洲业务，这家总部位于弗吉尼亚州的公司计划在美国上市。【原文：Smithfield Foods, the world's largest pork processor, on Tuesday announced the separation of its European operations as the Virginia-based firm plans to list in the United States.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行面临日益严峻的通胀挑战：敲诈勒索
item.description: 除了货币波动和供应冲击等让全球央行行长夜不能寐的共同挑战外，墨西哥的货币政策制定者还面临着另一个敌人：保护伞。【原文：Beyond the common challenges like currency fluctuations and supply shocks that keep the world's central bankers up at night, in Mexico there is an additional foe for those conjuring monetary policy: protection rackets.】

item.title: 美国 6 月房价按月下跌
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率将购房者推向观望并增加了住房供应，6 月份美国独户住宅价格下跌，创下近一年来最小的年度涨幅。【原文：U.S. single-family home prices fell in June, leading to the smallest annual increase in nearly a year, as higher mortgage rates pushed buyers to the sidelines and boosted housing supply.】

item.title: 菲利普-莫里斯公司将投资 2.32 亿美元扩大肯塔基州工厂的 ZYN 产量
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司周二表示，将投资 2.32 亿美元，扩大肯塔基州 Ownesboro 工厂 ZYN 尼古丁袋的生产能力，以满足强劲的需求。【原文：Philip Morris International said on Tuesday it would invest $232 million to expand production capacity for ZYN nicotine pouches at its Ownesboro, Kentucky plant, to meet the strong demand.】

item.title: 纳斯达克寻求美国证券交易委员会批准比特币指数期权
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所运营商周二表示，正在寻求监管机构为其推出比特币指数期权并进行交易开绿灯。【原文：Nasdaq is seeking the green light from regulators to launch and trade options on a bitcoin index, the exchange operator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国公司因挑战加剧而调整多元化政策
item.description: 在保守派团体不断施加压力的情况下，越来越多的美国公司正在修改其旨在提高工作场所种族和民族代表性的多元化、公平和包容（DEI）计划。【原文：More U.S. companies are modifying their diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) programs meant to boost racial and ethnic representation at workplaces amid rising pressure from conservative groups.】

item.title: 赫兹董事会新增两名成员，董事会成员增至 11 人
item.description: 赫兹汽车租赁公司周二表示，该公司已选举弗朗西斯-布莱克和露西-克拉克-多尔蒂担任董事会董事，使董事会成员人数从 9 人增至 11 人。【原文：Car rental company Hertz said on Tuesday it had elected Francis Blake and Lucy Clark Dougherty to serve as directors on its board, increasing the size to 11 members from nine.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货因原油价格下跌和国内银行盈利而下滑
item.description: 受原油价格下跌拖累，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周二下跌，而投资者则对国内主要贷款机构黯淡的季度业绩做出了反应。【原文：Futures linked to Canada's main stock index fell on Tuesday, dragged by declines in crude prices, while investors reacted to dour quarterly results from major domestic lenders.】

item.title: 阿根廷农民因担心玉米瘟疫和降雨前景而转种大豆
item.description: 阿根廷农民很可能在 2024/25 年度种植更多的大豆，在玉米上一季收成遭受毁灭性虫灾之后，他们将减少玉米的种植面积，而降雨预报将为大豆带来更多的雨水。【原文：Argentine farmers are likely to plant more soybeans in the current 2024/25 season, trimming the area dedicated to corn after that crop's last harvest was hit by a devastating insect plague and with rain forecasts looking rosier for soy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Aware Super 公司收购欧洲光纤平台股份，以利用人工智能的蓬勃发展
item.description: 澳大利亚养老基金 Aware Super 周二表示，它已收购了总部位于伦敦的带宽基础设施公司 euNetworks 的少数股份，希望借此进入人工智能热潮。【原文：Australian pension fund Aware Super said on Tuesday it has acquired a minority stake in London-headquartered bandwidth infrastructure company euNetworks, in a bid to tap into the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 中国剑网宣布 50 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: JD.com 周二表示，其董事会已批准一项新的 50 亿美元股票回购计划，该计划将于 9 月生效，允许这家中国电子商务巨头在未来 36 个月内回购股票。【原文：JD.com said on Tuesday its board has approved a new $5 billion share repurchase program, effective September, allowing the Chinese e-commerce giant to buy back its stock over the next 36 months.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 财报将揭示全球 Windows 系统故障造成的影响
item.description: CrowdStrike 公司周三发布的财报将首次披露上个月导致微软 Windows 操作系统瘫痪的全球网络瘫痪事件的财务影响，投资者希望了解该事件对这家网络安全公司声誉的影响，以及是否导致其市场份额可能被竞争对手夺走。【原文：CrowdStrike's results on Wednesday will offer a first look at the financial implications of the global cyber outage that paralyzed Microsoft Windows operating system last month, with investors keen to understand the impact on the cybersecurity firm's reputation and whether it has led to potential market share losses to rivals.】

item.title: 瑞银财富管理将美国经济衰退的概率从 20% 提高到 25
item.description: 瑞银全球财富管理公司（UBS Global Wealth Management）将美国经济衰退的几率从20%上调至25%，理由是就业增长疲软和7月份的失业数据加剧了人们对经济衰退的担忧。【原文：UBS Global Wealth Management has raised the odds of a U.S. recession to 25% from 20%, citing weakness stemming from softer jobs growth and the July unemployment data which stoked fears of a downturn.】

item.title: 关注利率和英伟达业绩，期指稳步上扬
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货持平至小幅上涨，原因是投资者对即将出台的宽松政策抱有希望，而本周晚些时候，英伟达（Nvidia）将公布备受期待的业绩，重要的经济数据也将出炉。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat to marginally higher on Tuesday as investors held on to hopes for imminent policy easing, with highly anticipated results from Nvidia and crucial economic data expected later in the week.】

item.title: 加拿大丰业银行第三季度利润因贷款损失准备金增加而下降
item.description: 加拿大丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）周二报告称，该银行第三季度利润下降，原因是在经济不确定的情况下，该银行留出了比去年同期更多的应急资金，以应对潜在的信贷损失。【原文：Canada's Bank of Nova Scotia reported a fall in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the lender set aside more in rainy-day funds, compared with a year earlier, to cover for potential credit losses amid an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 早间竞价英伟达上市前的犹豫不决掩盖了历史新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：2008 年危机以来 AAA 级债券首次亏损的背后是销售失败、评估延迟
item.description: 据一位熟悉情况的消息人士称，出售纽约市一座办公大楼的尝试失败，导致两家信用评级机构推迟一年多才将一笔商业抵押贷款债券降级为垃圾级。【原文：A failed attempt to sell a New York City office tower helped cause more than a year-long delay for two credit rating agencies to downgrade a commercial mortgage bond to junk, according to a source familiar with the situation and a review of filings from the agencies.】

item.title: 中国安踏体育宣布最多回购 13 亿美元股票
item.description: 中国体育用品制造商安踏体育周二表示，将斥资最多100亿港元（12.8亿美元）回购最多10%的股份，以保护股东利益。【原文：Chinese sportswear maker Anta Sports on Tuesday said it will spend up to HK$10 billion ($1.28 billion) to buy back up to 10% of its shares in a bid to protect shareholders' interests.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行因美国经济疲软和拨备增加而业绩不及预期
item.description: 加拿大蒙特利尔银行（BMO）周二公布的季度利润低于分析师预期，这是该银行连续第六个季度利润低于预期，原因是其美国零售业务的疲软，以及该银行为潜在不良贷款提取的准备金高于预期。【原文：Canada's Bank of Montreal (BMO) reported quarterly profit below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, its sixth miss in a row, hurt by weakness in its U.S. retail segment and as the lender made bigger than expected provisions for potential bad loans.】

item.title: 美国将授予惠普 5000 万美元用于半导体技术项目
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，计划向惠普公司拨款 5000 万美元，用于支持该公司在俄勒冈州现有设施的扩建和现代化改造，以促进关键半导体技术的发展。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Tuesday it plans to award $50 million to HP to support the expansion and modernization of an existing company facility in Oregon that will boost key semiconductor technologies.】

item.title: 索尼将把 PlayStation 5 在日本的售价提高 20
item.description: 索尼公司周二表示，考虑到包括全球经济波动在内的困难外部环境，索尼将把其 PlayStation 5（PS5）游戏机在日本的售价提高约 20%。【原文：Sony is raising the price of its PlayStation 5 (PS5) games console in Japan by about 20%, it said on Tuesday, citing a difficult external environment including global economic fluctations.】

item.title: 聚焦：一度被收购的中国石油巨头期待重振全球交易
item.description: 亚洲最大的石油生产商中国石油天然气集团公司（CNPC）的研究部门负责人表示，该公司正在重新审视其全球战略，希望重振交易，着眼于天然气液化和深海钻探，并在老井增产的基础上再接再厉。【原文：CNPC, Asia's top oil producer, is reviewing its global strategy as it looks to revive dealmaking, eyeing gas liquefaction and deepsea drilling as well as building on its record of producing more from aging wells, the head of its research arm said.】

item.title: Artisan 的 Herrick 说，Seven & i 可能被收购，这对日本企业来说是 "历史性的"。
item.description: 激进股东 Artisan Partners 的一位基金经理表示，日本 Seven & i 控股公司必须迅速行动起来，与加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司谈判一项具有 "历史意义 "的收购要约。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings must act fast to negotiate a takeover bid from Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard that has "historic implications", according to a fund manager at activist shareholder Artisan Partners.】

item.title: 瑞安航空的奥利里称波音新管理层 "继续令人失望
item.description: 瑞安航空集团首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周二表示，波音公司的新管理层 "继续令人失望"，飞机交付落后于计划。【原文：Ryanair Group Chief Executive Michael O'Leary on Tuesday said that Boeing's new management "continue to disappoint" and that deliveries were behind schedule.】

item.title: 行业组织称中国低空经济缺乏增长路线图
item.description: 一个行业组织周二表示，中国新兴的低空经济--由低海拔地区的有人或无人航空服务组成--吸引了投资者的兴趣，但许多投资者对该行业如何发展缺乏信息和指导。【原文：China's nascent low-altitude economy - made up of manned or unmanned aviation services at low elevations - has captured investors' interest but many lack information and guidance about how the sector could develop, an industry group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 扎克伯格称拜登政府迫使 Meta 审查 COVID-19 内容
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）表示，拜登政府的高级官员曾向他的社交媒体公司施压，要求其在大流行病期间审查 COVID-19 的内容。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg said senior officials in the Biden administration had pressured his social media company to censor COVID-19 content during the pandemic, adding that he would push back if this were to happen again.】

item.title: 日本央行开始初步研究将工资趋势纳入 "tankan
item.description: 日本央行（BOJ）周二表示，将开始初步研究在其季度 "tankan "商业调查中纳入工资相关项目，以便在国家货币政策中更准确地反映工资趋势。【原文：The Bank of Japan (BOJ) said on Tuesday it would start preliminary research on including wage-related items in its quarterly "tankan" business survey to more accurately reflect wage trends in the country's monetary policy.】

item.title: 英国零售商 Next 数千名员工赢得同工同酬案
item.description: 代表索赔人的律师周二表示，英国零售商 Next 的 3500 多名现任和前任店员赢得了长达六年的同工同酬法律诉讼。【原文：More than 3,500 current and former shop workers at British retailer Next have won a six-year legal fight for equal pay, lawyers representing the claimants said on Tuesday.】
